item.title: AutoMapper and MediatR Licensing Update
item.description: In my last post, I shared the news that I've decided to take a commercialization route for AutoMapper and MediatR to ensure their long-term success. While that post was heavy on the motivation, it was intentionally light on the details. I did share that I wanted to be Link to article: https://www.jimmybogard.com/automapper-and-mediatr-licensing-update/
